dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of three indoor scenes, created using an iPhone 13 mini in video mode. Each scene includes three video clips focusing on two objects and a third sequence observing the entire scene, with images extracted at 3.75 fps.
dcterms:title: Object-Centric Indoor Scenes

dcterms:creator: Angela Dai

dcterms:description: A dataset providing richly-annotated 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, consisting of 1513 RGB-D scenes with annotated camera poses.
dcterms:title: ScanNet Dataset

dcterms:creator: Matthew Tancik

dcterms:description: A dataset featuring a street scene captured using 12 cameras that surround a car driving along a straight street with a quarter turn.
dcterms:title: Mission Bay Dataset
